summary: Bang Bang Shrimp is a gluten free, dairy free, and pescatarian main course. One serving contains 510 calories, 21g of protein, and 31g of fat. For $2.94 per serving, this recipe covers 18% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 6. 850 people have tried and liked this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 30 minutes. If you have cooked white rice, vegetable oil, pepper, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the salt you could follow this main course with the Upside Down Pear and Apple Tart as a dessert. It is brought to you by Mother Thyme. With a spoonacular score of 60%, this dish is good. Users who liked this recipe also liked Low Carb Bang Bang Shrimp with Asian Slaw (Gluten Free), Copycat Cheesecake Factory Bang Bang Chicken and Shrimp, and Bang Bang Shrimp (Bonefish Grill Copycat).
title: Bang Bang Shrimp
